Detailed Description

template<class DataType>
class DzTStack< DataType >

A template class which embodies a push/pop style list.

This class is used to store items that do not require calling a copy constructor when copying objects from one memory space to another.

template<class DataType >
void DzTStack< DataType >::clear ( bool  freeMem = false  ) 

Empties the stack.

Parameters:
freeMem If false, it just sets the number of items in the stack to zero without freeing any space. If true, the memory used by the stack will be freed.
